      • isAuthorized

        private boolean isAuthorized(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
        Method that helps to find out if the user is authorized.
        Parameters:
        req - HTTP servlet request that helps identify the user using an HTTP session.
        Returns:
        true if the user has access to the command.
